__data__.text:
How	can	I	use	Pietra	to	start	a	business	and	make	money?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	is	the	easiest,	fastest,	and	most	affordable	way	to	start	a	business.	Pietra	offers	members	a	few	things	to	get	your	business	off	the	ground:
1)	It	has	a	vetted	supplier	and	manufacturing	network.	You	can	work	with	1000+	vetted	product	and	packaging	suppliers.	You	can	browse	all	of	them	
here
.
2)	You	can	make	more	money	by	using	Pietra's	3PL.	It's	lower	cost	than	most	fulfillment	centers	in	the	USA	and	allows	you	to	ship	quickly	all	around	the	USA	and	the	rest	of	the	world.	Want	to	see	how	much
cheaper	it	really	is?	You	can	see	the	rates	[here](https://static.pietrastudio.com/public/file_uploads/d492e5713fdc6af3d5d0dcff7dc05a56.pdf?
_gl=1*1ttiqdc*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE2Nzc0NjU3MzcuQ2owS0NRaUFvLXlmQmhEX0FSSXNBTnI1Nmc1R3g1a08waGcyZndPRjhxbDFCSE1PeE5CektlWmIyaURVTHBtSmhQQzRVVG1XYmNvZUJPNGFBdW10RUFMd193Y0I.).
3)	Want	to	make	more	sales?	You	can	sell	your	products	on	your	website	or	decide	to	list	your	products	on	Pietra's	Sales	Network.	Pietra's	Sales	Network	allows	you	to	sell	more	products	without	having	to	do
any	of	the	hard	work.	Just	send	your	items	to	Pietra's	members-only	3PL	and	list	your	products	on	the	wholesale,	retail,	and	DTC	platforms	you	choose.	Pietra	will	fulfill	all	the	items	for	you	and	pay	you	out
your	earnings	weekly.	You	can	list	your	products	on	Pietra's	Sales	Network	[here](https://creator.pietrastudio.com/ecommerce-services).

How	do	I	get	started	on	Pietra?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	is	a	platform	that	provides	software	and	services	to	help	you	start	and	scale	your	business.	To	get	started,	start	your
membership	by	clicking	
here
.
If	you	are	looking	to	get	started	with	sourcing,	start	browsing	and	chatting	with	different	suppliers	[here]
(https://creator.pietrastudio.com/home).
If	you	would	like	to	start	using	Pietra's	Fulfillment	Center	for	order	fulfillment,	you	can	sent	items	to	Pietra	for	storage	and
fulfillment	using	this	
link
.	You	can	look	for	the	button	that	says	"Ship	Items	To	Pietra".	Please	note,	if	you	purchase	products
from	the	sourcing	marketplace,	you	can	elect	to	have	the	items	ship	directly	to	a	Pietra	fulfillment	center	for	storage	and
fulfillment.
If	you	want	to	browse	all	the	different	sales	available	to	you	as	a	member,	you	can	visit	the	eCommerce	page	
here.
If	you're	looking	to	find	educational	resources,	workshops,	free	business	classes,	you	can	check	out	Pietra's	Resources	Hub
[here](https://creator.pietrastudio.com/educational-resources).

How	can	I	update	my	payment	information	in	my	Pietra	account?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Hover	over	the	drop	down	menu	on	the	top	left	hand	corner	in	the	creator	hub	and	tap	"Billing	and	Reporting".	From	there,	you
will	see	"Contact	&	Payment"	where	you	can	update	your	credit	card	information!

Where	can	I	find	invoices	for	my	subscription?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Hover	over	the	drop	down	menu	on	the	top	left	hand	corner	in	the	creator	hub.	From	there,	you	can	tap	"Billing	and
Reporting",	and	you'll	see	all	of	your	previous	subscription	invoices	within	"Sales	&	Services".

What	is	the	refund	policy	for	subscriptions?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
The	Pietra	platform	is	a	digital	platform	and	therefore,	
no	refunds	will	be	authorized
.	We	are	more	than	happy	to	cancel	a
subscription	at	any	time,	but	we	will	not	authorize	refunds	on	subscription	payments.
If	you	were	charged	for	a	monthly	subscription	after	signing	up	for	our	services,	you	can	reach	out	to	request	a	cancellation	so
you	will	not	be	charged	the	following	month.

What	is	the	cancellation	policy	for	subscriptions?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Should	you	need	to	cancel	your	subscription,	you	can	email	creators@pietrastudio.com	and	a	Pietra	Representative	will	be	able
to	assist	you.	Your	subscription	can	be	terminated	at	any	time.	Your	subscription	can	also	be	reactivated	at	any	time	by	emailing
creators@pietrastudio.com.
Please	note:	As	per	our	terms	and	conditions,	refunds	are	not	offered	for	subscriptions,	as	Pietra	is	a	digital	platform.

How	can	I	change	my	shop	name?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
On	the	left	hand	side	of	your	Creator	Hub	Homepage,	head	to	the	eCommerce	tab	and	select	"Manage	Products	&	Shop".	This
is	where	you	can	edit	your	products,	as	well	as	update	your	shop	information	(like	your	name	and	bio).
You'll	find	that	your	shop	name	can	be	edited	under	the	"Shop	Profile"	section.

Am	I	locked	into	Pietra?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	does	not	lock	you	into	anything.	We	are	here	to	grow	with	you	as	your	business	grows,	but	if	you	would	like	to	cancel	your
subscription,	you	can	do	so	at	any	time.	If	you	have	inventory	you	would	like	to	ship	from	the	warehouse	to	your	home,	you	can
initiate	the	process	by	emailing	
creators@pietrastudio.com
.	You	will	be	required	to	pay	shipping	fees	to	have	your	inventory	sent
to	you	from	the	warehouse.

Why	is	there	a	processing	fee?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
There	is	a	flat	3%	Service	&	Payment	Processing	Fee	on	every	sourcing	transaction	on	our	marketplace	as	we	have	a	team	of
people	who	will	handle	all	payment	processing	for	you,	international	and	otherwise.	Our	processing	fees	also	allow	you	the
convenience	of	Pietra	handling	all	of	your	payment	processing.
Additionally,	the	processing	fee	you	see	on	your	order	is	what	allows	Pietra	to	continuously	source	and	vet	the	top	manufacturers
in	the	world	to	make	them	available	to	you.	It	also	ensures	a	premium	customer	experience,	and	the	ability	for	our	support	team
to	ensure	safe	delivery	of	your	orders	to	your	home.

Can	I	use	Pietra	to	launch	multiple	product	lines?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Absolutely!	You	can	use	Pietra	to	set	up	as	many	brands	and	product	lines	as	youâ€™d	like.	Once	you	have	one	successful
product	line	with	a	trusted	supplier,	you	may	want	to	expand	your	business!
Your	subscription	includes	access	to	ultra	low	cost	storage,	assembly,	and	fulfillment	so	you	can	launch	multiple	product	lines
and	manage	them	all	from	one	place.

Why	is	Pietra	the	smartest	way	to	launch	my	e-commerce	brand?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	offers	a	bundle	of	services	that	are	all	connected	together	which	makes	it	incredibly	easy	to	launch	and	scale	our	e-
commerce	brand.	Pietra	provides	a	production	marketplace	with	hundreds	of	vetted	suppliers	who	work	with	some	of	the	top
brands.	Pietra	also	provides	ultra	low	cost	storage,	fulfillment,	and	assembly	so	you	don't	have	to	stitch	together	all	those
services.	Also,	Pietra	allows	you	to	set	up	a	website	or	connect	your	Shopify	to	the	platform,	so	you	can	manage	your	entire
operations	from	one	place!

How	do	I	launch	my	brand?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	gives	you	the	opportunity	to	find	high	quality	suppliers,	create	custom	product	&	packaging,	and	send	all	your
components	to	our	warehouse	for	assembly	and	storage.	Our	platform	and	marketplace	enable	you	to	develop	your	product	with
trusted	suppliers	at	low	minimums,	which	in	turn	allows	you	to	keep	your	costs	down	as	you	build	your	business	from	the
ground	up.
When	you	are	ready	to	sell	your	product,	you	can	sell	it	on	the	Pietra	Marketplace	or	on	your	own	website.	In	either	case,	we	will
store,	assemble	and	ship	your	orders	directly	from	our	fulfillment	center,	all	the	while	saving	you	tons	of	time	and	money!

How	can	I	contact	Pietra?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
You	can	feel	free	to	email	us	at	anytime	for	any	reason!
The	best	email	address	to	reach	us	is	
creators@pietrastudio.com
This	email	is	monitored	daily,	and	you	should	expect	an	initial	reply	within	1	business	day.
We	also	host	multiple	live	webinars	every	week,	open	to	everyone!	Feel	free	to	register	[here](https://pietra.zendesk.com/hc/en-
us/articles/5448400706327-How-can-I-join-your-free-business-classes-webinars-)	to	learn	how	to	best	navigate	the	Pietra
platform	and	all	of	our	services,	resources,	and	tools!
If	you	are	looking	for	more	hands-on	help	and	1:1	support,	consider	subscribing	to	our	Professional	Plan!	Check	our	our	pricing
and	offerings	[here](https://www.pietrastudio.com/pricing/).

I	want	to	create	a	product	line	but	I	don't	see	it	in	the	sourcing	marketplace.	What
should	I	do?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Pietra's	Sourcing	Marketplace	is	made	up	of	contract	manufacturers	who	can	make	almost	anything.	Most	of	the	items	you	see
on	the	marketplace	are	samples	of	past	projects	that	you	can	purchase	to	test	quality.	Each	supplier	profile	also	indicates	their
manufacturing	capability.	If	you	see	something	that	is	similar	to	what	you	want	to	make,	you	can	chat	with	the	supplier	directly
on	Pietra	and	ask	them	if	they	can	make	it.
If	you	already	know	exactly	what	you	want	to	create,	you	also	have	the	option	of	creating	an	RFP	which	allows	you	to	submit	a
request	to	the	manufacturing	network	and	let	suppliers	respond	to	you.	For	example,	if	you	are	looking	for	a	very	specific	type	of
sweater,	you	can	fill	out	an	RFP	and	let	all	the	sweater	factories	in	Pietra's	network	send	you	a	message	if	they	are	able	to	make
the	item	you	are	requesting.
Finally,	Pietra	is	always	adding	new	factories	and	new	items	to	the	sourcing	marketplace.	You	should	check	back	in	frequently	in
case	a	new	factory	has	been	added	to	our	network	that	may	be	able	to	work	with	you!
You	can	also	help	us	out	by	letting	us	know	of	something	you're	interested	in	that	you're	unable	to	find	on	the	platform.	Simply
write	into	
creators@pietrstudio.com,	
and	we'll	be	more	than	happy	to	assist.	Also,	continue	to	check	back	in	as	we	onboard	new
suppliers	to	our	platform	every	day!

Why	is	custom	packaging	important?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Custom	packaging	is	great	for	your	business	for	many	reasons.	Especially	now,	when	there	are	so	many	amazing	products	out
there,	having	custom	packaging	is	a	fantastic	way	to	separate	your	brand	from	the	pack.	While	having	custom	packaging	is
certainly	not	required,	it	can	be	really	helpful	for	brand	awareness,	as	well	as	to	show	your	customers	that	you	took	extreme	care
into	creating	your	products,	even	down	to	the	smallest	details.
Custom	packaging	is	also	not	limited	to	shipping	materials	like	boxes	and	polymailers.	With	Pietra's	robust	network	of
packaging	suppliers,	you	can	also	source	custom	tissue	paper,	stickers,	tape,	note	cards,	and	more!	Just	as	when	you	source	your
products,	you	can	start	by	ordering	samples	to	test	quality	and/or	working	with	suppliers	directly	to	create	a	custom	packaging
sample.	You	can	also	submit	a	custom	project	request	specifically	for	packaging!
Again,	while	custom	packaging	is	not	a	requirement,	it	can	be	a	really	great	way	to	kick	off	the	relationship	between	your
customers	and	your	brand.	If	it's	within	your	budget,	we'd	definitely	recommend	creating	custom	packaging	with	Pietra.
Just	remember	to	get	sourcing	as	early	as	possible,	so	that	you	can	time	everything	perfectly	surrounding	your	launch	date!	You
don't	want	to	have	your	products	finished	and	ready	for	sale,	and	then	have	to	delay	your	launch	because	your	packaging	wasn't
complete.	We'd	recommend	that	you	begin	sourcing	your	packaging	at	the	same	time	you	start	to	source	your	products.

How	quickly	do	Pietra's	suppliers	respond	to	messages/inquiries?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Response	times	will	vary	from	supplier	to	supplier.	Please	head	to	the	supplier's	profile	page	from	within	the	Creator	Hub,	and
you	will	see	an	average	response	time	listed	on	the	bottom	lefthand	corner	of	the	page.	Some	suppliers	respond	within	a	couple	of
hours,	while	others	may	take	several	days.
The	response	times	listed	should	be	accurate,	as	suppliers	cannot	manually	input	this	information;	it	is	based	on	data	that	our
system	pulls	from	the	previous	conversations	that	have	been	started	between	that	supplier	and	other	Creators.	If	reply	times	are
important	to	you	as	you	are	launching	and	scaling	your	business,	this	is	a	great	thing	to	keep	in	mind	when	looking	for	suppliers
in	the	platform.
In	the	event	that	your	supplier	has	become	unresponsive,	please	do	follow	up	with	them	directly	and	reach	out	to
creators@pietrastudio.com	
for	further	assistance.

What	kinds	of	filtering	options	are	there	available	when	sourcing?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Pietra	makes	it	super	easy	for	you	to	filter	when	sourcing	in	the	Creator	Hub!	You	can	filter	for	manufacturers	based	in	the	US
vs.	those	that	are	international,	as	well	as	countless	other	attributes	that	may	be	important	to	you.	These	filters	include,	but	are
not	limited	to,	suppliers	that	have	been	in	business	for	10+	years,	those	that	use	sustainable	materials,	manufacturers	that	are
BIPOC	owned,	those	that	can	accommodate	low	MOQs	(minimum	order	quantities),	and	more!	You'll	find	these	filters	on	the
lefthand	side	of	the	Creator	Hub	when	you're	within	the	Sourcing	tab.

I'm	worried	about	the	integrity	of	my	idea	and/or	design	when	working	with
suppliers.	How	can	I	protect	myself?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
You	definitely	shouldn't	worry	about	your	supplier(s)	taking	your	ideas	or	designs!	Pietra	works	very	hard	to	vet	and	train	our
partnered	suppliers	to	ensure	the	highest	level	of	professionalism.
That	being	said,	if	you	would	like	any	added	layer	of	protection,	you	are	more	than	welcome	to	submit	NDAs	to	any	supplier(s)
that	you	work	with.	All	of	our	suppliers	are	open	to	working	with	you	to	make	sure	you	feel	that	all	precautions	are	being
addressed	and	handled	with	care.
For	any	legal	advice,	we	recommend	seeking	counsel	outside	of	Pietra.

Can	I	make	a	fully	custom	product	with	Pietra's	suppliers/manufacturers?	Or,	does	it
have	to	be	private	label?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Yes!	Most	of	the	suppliers	in	Pietra's	network	can	accommodate	both	private	label	products	as	well	as	fully	custom	projects.	You
can	chat	with	our	suppliers	directly	from	within	the	Creator	Hub,	and	the	process	is	designed	to	be	super	collaborative!
We	also	recommend	using	our	feature	to	"
Request	Custom	Project
".	All	of	our	suppliers	can	make	items	that	are	fully	custom,
so	feel	free	to	get	creative!	If	you	don't	see	something	you	like	you	can	post	a	custom	request,	and	all	suppliers	in	your	relevant
category	will	receive	a	message	from	you.	Any	suppliers	who	can	create	your	product	will	reach	out	to	you	directly	with	more
information!
Always	feel	free	to	message	your	suppliers	directly	with	any	questions	or	requests,	and	they	will	let	you	know	what	they	can	and
cannot	accommodate.

Who	is	liable	if	a	customer	were	to	take	legal	action	after	using	a	product	sold	by	a
Pietra	Creator?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Pietra	does	not	take	responsibility	or	liability	for	any	products	created	between	a	Creator	and	a	Supplier	on	the	marketplace.	We
have	vetted	and	trained	suppliers	on	the	platform,	but	you	should	do	your	due	diligence	when	sourcing	products,	and	ask
suppliers	for	any	documentation	you	may	need.	It	is	also	the	Creator's	responsibility	to	enter	into	agreements	with	the	Supplier
to	protect	the	Creator	against	these	types	of	legal	actions.

How	can	I	be	sure	my	manufacturer	won't	take	my	idea	and	sell	it	as	their	own?	Does
Pietra	have	any	protections	in	place?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Since	you	will	be	working	directly	with	your	manufacturer	on	a	custom	product,	you	will	own	all	the	rights	to	the	designs.	Pietra
does	not	create	any	products	and	as	a	new	business	owner,	you	will	have	created	something	truly	unique	that's	all	yours!
For	any	additional	patenting,	copywriting,	trademarking,	necessary	nondisclosure	agreements	etc.,	we	recommend	handling	this
independent	of	Pietra,	as	we	do	not	currently	offer	legal	services.

I	just	placed	a	sourcing	order,	but	now	I	need	to	cancel.	What	do	I	do?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Sample/Inventory	orders	cannot	be	canceled,	and	are	non-refundable.
When	a	sourcing	order	is	placed,	the	corresponding	supplier	is	immediately	notified,	and	they	will	begin	working	to	produce
your	product.	Therefore,	any	requests	to	cancel	sample	orders	cannot	be	accommodated.
In	the	event	that	you	need	to	cancel	a	production	order,	
please	communicate	with	your	supplier	first	to	make	any	changes
,	as	each
of	our	partnered	suppliers	have	a	different	cadence	by	which	they	begin	production	on	samples.
If	your	supplier	is	able	to	make	an	exception	and	cancel	your	order,	
please	make	sure	they	contact	Pietra	directly	to	confirm	the
cancelation
.
Once	the	cancelation	is	confirmed	by	the	supplier,	Pietra	will	process	your	refund	where	applicable.

I've	messaged	a	supplier,	but	they	haven't	responded.	What	do	I	do?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Pietra's	partnered	suppliers	traditionally	respond	to	messages	and	inquiries	within	24-48	hours.	With	that	in	mind,	during	busier
times	of	year	and	periods	of	greater	volume,	responses	may	take	up	to	several	days.	We	also	recommend	checking	the	supplier
profile	page	to	see	the	supplier's	average	response	time.
If	you	have	not	received	a	response	from	a	supplier	within	these	general	timelines,	it	is	okay	to	message	them	again.	The
partnership	with	your	supplier(s)	is	intended	to	be	a	collaborative	experience;	please	feel	free	to	reinitiate	contact	if	you	feel	a
message	is	not	being	responded	to	in	a	timely	manner.
Please	also	note,	many	of	Pietra's	suppliers	are	international,	and	may	have	alternate	operating	hours	than	the	location	from
which	you	are	sending	your	inquiry.
All	of	this	being	said,	if	you	are	dealing	with	an	unresponsive	supplier,	please	contact	
creators@pietrastudio.com
	so	that	we	can
address	this	internally.

What	are	Pietra's	SLAs?	(Service	Level	Agreements,	i.e.	expected	turnaround	times)
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing

creators@pietrastudio.com

If	I	have/find	a	supplier	outside	of	Pietra's	network,	can	I	still	use	Pietra's	fulfillment
services?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
Absolutely!	If	you	have/find	a	supplier	outside	of	Pietra's	network,	you	can	still	benefit	from	many	of	Pietra's	other	offered
services,	such	as	assembly,	storage	&	fulfillment	through	our	warehouse.
Additionally,	you	have	the	ability	to	notify	your	supplier	to	join	Pietra	directly	through	our	platform!	Simply	go	to	"My
Suppliers"	in	the	Sourcing	Tab	and	tap	"Connect	My	Supplier"	on	the	top	righthand	corner	of	the	page.
Pietraâ€™s	team	will	train	your	supplier	on	Pietra,	send	them	shipping	labels,	and	prepare	them	to	streamline	your	logistics.
Once	approved,	youâ€™ll	be	able	to	chat	with	them	and	pay	invoices	through	Pietra.
Pietra	trains	suppliers	for	you	so	that	you	never	have	any	headaches	and	can	track	all	your	logistics	in	one	place.
In	the	event	that	your	supplier	does	not	want	to	join	Pietra's	network,	you	are	still	at	liberty	to	work	with	them,	while	utilizing
Pietra	for	your	other	business-building	needs!

form	[here](https://creators.pietrastudio.com/receivings/send-inventory).

How	can	I	make	sure	my	products	are	high-quality?
group:	Designing	&	Sourcing	Products
At	Pietra,	we	take	a	lot	of	time	and	care	into	vetting	the	suppliers	that	we	choose	to	partner	with	and	present	on	our	platform.	If
there	is	an	issue,	we	always	recommend	that	you	reach	out	to	your	supplier	directly	to	come	to	a	resolution.	That	being	said,	if
there	are	any	issues,	disputes,	or	miscommunications,	we	will	be	happy	to	step	in	and	do	the	work	to	resolve	the	problem	directly
with	your	supplier.	Additionally,	we	will	make	sure	to	keep	record	of	any	and	all	issues,	so	that	we	are	consistently	auditing	the
partners	we	do	and	do	not	want	to	maintain	moving	forward.	Having	access	to	communicate	and	order	samples/inventory	from
these	partnered	suppliers	is	one	of	the	many	benefits	of	subscribing	to	Pietra.

should	also	trigger	an	email	notification	to	you,	so	that	you	are	always	up	to	date	on	your	supplier	communication	throughout

Please	always	do	your	best	to	clearly	communicate	your	needs	with	your	supplier(s)	and	confirm	production	and	shipping
timelines,	so	proper	expectations	can	be	set.

Yes!	In	fact,	we	encourage	it.	As	a	Pietra	member,	you	have	access	to	chat	with,	video	call,	and	audio	call,	a	factory	before	you

out	the	local	time	for	your	supplier	when	expecting	responses.	Most	chats	are	answered	on	Pietra	within	24	hours.	Y
ou	can	also

	all	orders,	payments,	and	communication	within	the	Pietra

How	can	I	connect	my	Shopify	to	Pietra?
group:	E-Commerce	&	Sales	Channels
We're	so	excited	to	hear	that	you're	interested	in	connecting	your	existing	sales	channel	to	Pietra!
In	order	to	connect	your	Shopify	to	Pietra,

Creator	Marketplace

What	are	the	receiving	guidelines	and	protocols	for	Pietra's	fulfillment	center?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
If	you	are	a	Creator	who	is	shipping	your	product	from	an	off-platform	supplier,	you	and	your	supplier	must	follow	certain
guidelines	for	proper	receiving	at	Pietra's	warehouse.
Please	review	our	full	receiving	guidelines	
here
,	but	take	note	of	some	highlights	below
:
1.	What	is	Good	Faith	Receiving?
Our	receiving	process	is	referred	to	as	good	faith	receiving.	This	means	that	our	modus	operandi	assumes	that	the	quantity	of
SKUs	listed	on	each	carton	is	identical	to	the	quantity	present	in	the	shipment.	If	the	supplier	short-shipped	SKUs,	it	may	not	be
clear	until	months	later.
2.	Are	there	any	costs	for	receiving?
No!	Unlike	most	fulfillment	centers	we	do	not	charge	for	receiving.	If	your	shipment	however	does	not	meet	the	receiving
guidelines	there	will	be	a	fee	charged.	The	fee	will	be	based	on	the	size	of	the	shipment	and	the	number	of	issues.
3.	Why	do	I	need	to	communicate	a	new	shipment	&	tracking	information	in	the	first	place?
Imagine	several	boxes	of	a	product	are	dropped	off.	No	one	recognizes	the	item;	there's	no	account	name	ascribed	to	the	boxes,
nor	are	there	SKU	names.	Without	a	proper	receiving	protocol,	managing	inventory	would	be	challenging	and	disorganized.
For	that	reason,	communicating	shipments	in	advance	and	providing	tracking	numbers	prior	to	shipping	is	necessary	to	ensure
that	your	inventory	is	identified	and	processed	properly.
Pietraâ€™s	Receiving	Special	Projects
If	a	Receiving	does	not	follow	the	
Receiving	Guidelines
,	it	will	incur	Receiving	Special	Project	charges	at	the	following	rates:

If	my	customers	place	orders	for	items	that	are	out	of	stock,	will	Pietra	still	ship	my
order?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
While	it's	not	advised	that	you	sell	items	on	your	website	that	are	not	physically	in	stock	in	the	fulfillment	center,	it	is	still
possible.
All	orders	that	are	processed	by	Pietra's	Fulfillment	Center	will	be	put	on	hold	if	one	or	more	items	is	not	in	stock.	You	will	be
notified	by	email	if	an	order	cannot	be	fulfilled	due	to	one	or	more	items	being	out	of	stock	or	not	physically	available	in	the
Pietra	Fulfillment	Center.
When	you	are	notified	about	the	order	that	is	on	hold,	you	will	be	able	to	tell	the	warehouse	reps	how	you	would	like	to	proceed
with	the	order.
For	items	that	are	on	pre-sale,	they	will	be	marked	separately	during	your	setup	with	Pietra's	Fulfillment	Center	so	you	are	not
notified	of	these	orders	on	hold.
Please	note:	If	an	item	is	put	on	hold	it	may	not	ship	out	within	Pietra's	Fulfillment	SLA.

Who	is	Pietra	for?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	is	a	tool	that	can	help	beginners	get	from	idea	to	launch;	it	is	also	a	tool	that	will	allow	existing	business	owners	to	scale
their	businesses.
Our	platform	was	created	for	entrepreneurs	of	all	sizes!	Whether	you're	looking	to	launch	your	first	product	or	grow	your
brand,	Pietra	provides	the	tools	you	need	to	build	a	great	product	and	business	with	a	fraction	of	the	work	and	cost.
For	beginners,	Pietra	helps	you	create	a	business	plan,	educates	you	through	workshops	and	classes	with	professionals,	and	even
recommends	product,	packaging,	and	creative	suppliers	you	can	work	with	at	affordable	rates.
Pietra	also	provides	tools	and	resources	to	help	you	launch	and	grow	sales.	Existing	businesses	use	Pietra	to	manage	their
suppliers	or	find	new	suppliers,	in	addition	to	streamlining	international	logistics,	international	payments,	and	making	assembly
&	fulfillment	processes	easier	and	more	efficient.

to	discuss	further,	and	we	can	provide	any	relevant	solutions!

How	will	I	be	charged	for	the	fulfillment	services	I	use	with	Pietra?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
Creators	will	be	billed	weekly	for	orders	fulfilled	during	the	previous	week.	This	invoice	will	be	inclusive	of	shipping
reimbursement	on	fulfilled	orders,	fulfillment	fees	and	any	relevant	sales	fees.
All	assembly	&	photography	fees	will	be	on	an	as	needed	basis.	Pricing	for	your	assembly	and	photography	needs	will	be
disseminated	during	assembly	calls,	and	are	one-time	fees.	We	currently	offer	eCommerce	photography	for	$39.00/photo!
During	your	assembly	call	with	our	logistics	team,	Pietra	will	determine	how	you	will	be	charged	for	storage	in	our	fulfillment
center,	based	on	the	amount	of	space	your	inventory	takes	up	in	the	warehouse.	This	will	then	be	sets	up	as	a	monthly	recurring
storage	invoice.
Pietra	will	reevaluate	your	storage	space	on	a	monthly	basis,	depending	on	any	changes	in	your	inventory	levels.

I/my	customer	has	just	placed	an	order,	but	need	to	cancel.	What	do	I	do?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
After	a	sales	order	is	placed,	it	is	immediately	sent	to	Pietra's	logistics	team	for	fulfillment.	
If	you	wish	to	cancel	an	order,	this
must	be	done	within	one	(1)	hour	of	placing	the	order.
If	you	contact	us	to	cancel	your	order	more	than	one	(1)	hour	after	it	was	placed,	our	team	will	do	our	best	to	catch	the	order
before	it	is	fulfilled,	but	cannot	guarantee	it	will	be	stopped	in	time.
To	cancel	an	order,	either	email	us	at	
creators@pietrastudio.com
	or	"Submit	a	Warehouse	Ticket"	from	within	the	Creator
Hub.
Sourcing	orders	are	nonrefundable,	but	please	communicate	with	your	supplier	directly	if	you	need	to	make	any	changes,	in	the
event	that	they	may	be	able	to	accommodate	you.

Do	I	have	to	ship	my	product	from	Pietra's	fulfillment	center?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
While	shipping	your	product	from	Pietra's	warehouse	will	be	affordable	and	hassle	free,
you	do	not	have	to	use	our	fulfillment
services
.
If	you	prefer	to	fulfill	your	orders	from	your	own	home	or	fulfillment	center,	you	are	absolutely	at	liberty	to	do	so.

How	does	Pietra	verify	their	partnered	manufacturers/suppliers?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
Pietra	has	teams	on	the	ground	domestically	and	abroad	to	vet	and	verify	every	supplier	is	using	humane	practices	and	has	safe
working	conditions.	While	we	work	very	hard	to	properly	vet	these	partners,	Pietra	serves	as	a	liaison	to	provide	its	creators
with	the	ability	to	communicate	with	and	work	with	these	suppliers.	Pietra	will	always	assist	in	addressing	any	issues	creators
have	with	their	suppliers,	but	is	not	responsible	for	the	terms,	conditions,	and	procedures	by	which	these	manufacturers	operate.
Feel	free	to	communicate	with	any	supplier	on	the	platform	regarding	any	questions	or	concerns	you	may	have.	You	are	welcome
to	have	them	send	any	certifications	you	would	like	to	see.

I'm	using	Pietra's	3PL	and	have	an	issue	with	a	customer	order,	what	do	I	do?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
If	there	is	a	problem	with	one	or	more	of	your	customer	orders,	(i.e.	damaged	item,	lost/delayed	shipment,	wrong	item	sent,	etc.)
please	
Submit	a	Warehouse	Ticket	
so	that	our	logistics	team	can	rectify	the	issue	as	soon	as	possible.
To	submit	a	warehouse	ticket,	go	to	Fulfillment	>	Orders	&	Fulfillment	>	Fulfilled	Orders	>	Submit	Warehouse	Ticket.
This	will	notify	our	logistics	team	immediately,	and	your	issue	will	be	resolved	within	1	business	day.	Our	Customer	Care	team
will	reach	out	to	you	as	soon	as	the	issue	is	resolved,	and	provide	you	with	tracking	information	or	a	return	label,	where
applicable.

What	is	the	cost	of	duties	and	tariffs	for	my	inventory	order(s)?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
Duties	and	tariffs	will	vary	depending	on	the	value	of	your	goods,	as	determined	by	the	manufacturer.	There	is	not	a	reliable	way
to	estimate	the	cost	of	these	fees	until	your	order	arrives	in	the	United	States.

Am	I	responsible	for	duties	and	tariffs	incurred	when	my	inventory	arrives?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
Yes
.	If	your	supplier	is	international,	your	inventory	shipment	will	incur	duties	and	tariffs	when	it	arrives	at	the	port	in	the
United	States.	At	that	time,	Pietra	will	receive	a	notice	from	customs	to	clear	your	shipment.	We	will	initially	make	this	payment
to	release	your	goods,	and	they	will	then	be	sent	to	the	Pietra	Fulfillment	Center.	At	that	time,	our	logistics	team	will	notify	you
of	the	cost	of	duties	and	tariffs	for	your	order	and	request	authorization	to	charge	the	credit	card	we	have	on	file.

When	will	I	be	charged	for	the	shipping	of	my	inventory?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
Your	supplier	has	two	options	when	charging	you	for	shipping	costs	for	your	inventory	order.	They	can	either	charge	you	for
shipping	prior	to	the	creation	of	your	goods	and	include	it	on	your	initial	invoice,
or
they	can	choose	to	wait	until	your	goods	are
ready	to	ship.	It	is	common	for	Suppliers	to	send	a	follow	up	invoice	for	shipping	at	the	time	when	the	goods	are	ready	to	ship.	In
either	case,	you	will	be	responsible	for	shipping,	duties,	and	tariff	costs	associated	with	shipping	your	inventory	order.

When	will	I	be	charged	for	my	inventory?
group:	Warehousing,	Shipping	&	Fulfillment
You	will	be	charged	for	your	inventory	before	your	supplier	begins	to	create	your	goods.	After	discussing	your	order	via	chat,
the	supplier	will	send	you	an	invoice	through	the	Pietra	platform	to	purchase	your	inventory.	Once	you	pay	for	the	inventory
order,	production	on	your	order	will	begin.	Please	note,	a	supplier	may	add	shipping	to	your	inventory	invoice,	or	they	may
charge	you	for	shipping	when	the	goods	are	ready	to	ship.	This	will	be	noted	on	your	invoice.

How	much	does	it	cost	to	launch	my	brand?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
To	launch	your	product	line	you'll	need	to	purchase	samples,	design	your	product	&	packaging,	and	stock	inventory.	These	costs	are	dependent	on	what	you	are	creating	and	can	vary	from	supplier	to
supplier.
There	are	always	ways	in	which	you	as	a	creator	can	work	with	your	supplier	to	cut	costs.	For	example,	working	with	an	international	supplier	may	provide	for	lower	production	costs	than	one	based	in	the
United	States.	Choosing	to	have	your	inventory	shipped	via	sea	travel	as	opposed	to	air	travel	can	also	help	to	lower	your	costs.
Pietra	always	recommends	discussing	budget	and	timelines	with	your	suppliers	as	early	as	possible,	so	that	proper	expectations	are	set.
You	can	also	learn	more	about	Pietra	subscription	pricing	
here
,	fulfillment	pricing	[here](https://static.pietrastudio.com/public/file_uploads/067146bb97a84f956e206a496fe0cb68.pdf?

does	not

If	you	are	using	Pietra's	Fulfillment	Center	to	store	and	ship	your	products	to	your	customers	then	there	is	nothing	more	you

Creators@pietrastudio.com

.

Do	you	have	an	overview	of	what	Pietra	Offers?
group:	Educational	Resources
Pietra	offers	entrepreneurs	and	brands	three	main	things:
1)	Access	to	a	vetted	manufacturing	network.	Members	are	allowed	to	contact	and	work	with	900+	handpicked	suppliers	from
around	the	world	that	already	work	with	top	brands.	This	saves	you	time	and	money	trying	to	find	the	perfect	manufacturing
partner.
2)	A	members-only	fulfillment	center	where	you	can	store	your	brands	products	and	inventory	and	ship	your	products	around
the	world	to	customers,	retailers,	and	wholesalers.	Think	of	it	as	your	own	warehouse,	only	more	affordable.	Storage	and
fulfillment	rates	are	30-50%	lower	than	if	you	went	somewhere	else.
3)	An	online	sales	network	to	get	your	products	online	and	selling.	If	you're	starting	small,	you	can	create	a	Pietra	storefront	and
start	selling	quickly.	If	you're	looking	to	grow,	you	can	list	your	products	on	15+	sales	channels	to	sell	your	products	in	popular
shopping	destinations	without	having	to	manage	many	different	accounts.
Still	curious	about	how	it	all	works?	Check	out	our	detailed	Pietra	Handbook
here
!
This	document	includes	all	of	the	information	you	may	need	to	best	navigate	the	platform.	This	will	cover	everything	from
onboarding	to	sourcing	&	fulfillment,	to	communication	and	returns.	Lots	of	this	information	is	also	covered	in	our	weekly
webinars,	which	you	can	register	for	[here](https://pietra.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/5448400706327)!

What	educational	resources	does	Pietra	have	to	help	me	launch	my	business?

free
	weekly	business	classes	that	you	can	signup	for	directly	from	the	"Education	&	Help"	tab	within	the	Creator

What	does	it	cost	to	use	Pietra?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	uses	a	membership	model	for	entrepreneurs	and	brands.	Members	pay	a	monthly	subscription	fee	to	get	access	to	the	tools
and	infrastructure	required	to	launch	and	scale	their	business.	Pietra's	services	are	available,	a	la	carte,	and	members	can	pick
what	parts	of	the	platform	they	want	to	use.
Pietra	offers	three	flexible	plans:
The
Beginner	Plan	($39/month)
	is	for	upstarts	and	small	brands	who	ship	or	plan	to	ship	less	than	500	orders	per	month.	When
you	subscribe	to	Pietra,	you	get	access	to	everything	Pietra	has	to	offer	to	get	your	brand	off	the	ground.	This	includes:	access	to
educational	resources	and	workshops,	our	sourcing	marketplace	with	the	ability	to	communicate	and	work	with	over	up	to	10
suppliers,	warehousing	+	fulfillment	services	at	ultra	low	rates	($1.50/order	fulfillment),	as	well	as	the	ability	to	connect	up	to	3
additional	sales	channels	to	sell	your	products.
Members	who	select	this	plan	also	get	access	to	several	planning	tools	and	business	blueprints	that	that	serve	as	a	step-by-step
guide	for	launching	your	first	product	line	or	brand.
The
Scaling	Plan	($89/month)
	is	for	fast	growing	brands	who	ship	between	500	and	2000	orders	per	month.	This	plan	is	similar	to
the	Beginner	Plan	but	offers	brands	20%	lower	cost	fulfillment	($1.25/order),	storage,	and	shipping	rates.	It	also	allows	you	to
work	with	up	to	25	suppliers	and	connect	up	to	7	sales	channels	to	list	your	product	and	grow	your	sales.
Our	
Pietra	Professional	($199/month)	
is	for	businesses	shipping	2,000+	orders	per	month.	This	plan	is	for	big	brands	who	are
looking	to	get	the	lowest	cost	software	and	infrastructure	to	scale	their	brands.	Professional	tier	members	of	Pietra	will	get
significantly	reduced	fulfillment	rates	at	$1.15/order	for	unlimited	picks,	as	well	as	the	ability	to	work	with	an	unlimited	number
of	suppliers,	connect	an	unlimited	number	of	sales	channels,	and	get	priority	2-hr	support.	This	professional	tier	also	comes	with
access	to	Pietra	Specialist	who	you	can	book	1:1	sessions	with	tohelp	you	with	sourcing,	fulfillment	and	eCommerce.
Take	a	closer	look	at	our	pricing	
here
.

Do	I	need	an	LLC	to	start	my	business	with	Pietra?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
You	do	not	need	an	LLC	to	build	a	business	with	Pietra!	That	said,	if	you	have	any	questions	or	concerns	pertaining	to	legal

Does	Pietra	work	worldwide?	Or	is	it	geared	towards	only	those	in	the	USA?
group:	Pietra	Platform	&	Pricing
Pietra	does	work	worldwide!	Our	robust	network	of	both	Creators	and	Suppliers/Manufacturers	are	located	all	around	the
world.
Pietra's	warehouse	is	located	in	North	Carolina,	but	accommodates	fulfillment	globally.
